name: Roberts Cargo Dollies: Heavy-Duty 1000 lb. (2-Pack)
description: The Roberts 1000 lb. Heavy-Duty Cargo Dollies (2-Pack) are constructed of industrial-strength steel that is bolted and welded together, and each dolly will hold up to 1000 lb. The dollies can be used to move rolls of carpet, sheeting, furniture, appliances and equipment. Use the spring-loaded lock pin to adjust the dollies from 24 in. to 33 in. in length. Non-mar, 3 in. polyurethane wheels provide easy movement without damaging floors.Industrial-strength steel with welded and bolted construction3 in. heavy-duty, non-mar polyurethane wheels with ball bearings1,000 lb. load capacity per dolly24 - 33 in. adjustable length with spring-loaded lock pins
